item.title: A Brief History of the DMCA
item.author: Tiexin Guo | 郭铁心
item.description: Note This article is orignally published at GitGuardian Blog. What is DMCA? The DMCA is short for the Digital Millennium Copyright Act. On Oct 12, 1998, the US Congress passed the DMCA, which amended U.S. copyright law to address important issues of the relationship between copyright and the internet. It was signed into law by President Clinton on Oct 28, 1998. What Exactly Does It Mean? I know, the term
